newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: PdVSA Amuay sees cat cracker fixed by end of week.
newsitem.headline: PdVSA Amuay sees cat cracker fixed by end of week.

text.p: Technical problems with a catalytic cracker at Petroleos de Venezuela's (PdVSA) 470,000 barrels per day Amuay refinery will be fixed by the end of the week, a refinery spokesman said.
"I've just been talking with the technicians and they assure me the cracker will be up and running again in the course of the week," he said. "Client deliveries will not be affected," he added.
The 108,000 bpd cracker unit went down Sunday after problems with an air compressor. The unit last failed in July, with deliveries met from reserves while it was fixed.
